name: Proxym4 PONG
description:
This is the first game of the Game Dev Chronology serie.

This serie has for objective to remake video games from the early ones.

Here is my version of PONG as a local two players game.

The left player uses Z and S to move and the right player uses Up and Down arrows.

Enjoy the game ! 

Feel free to give a feedback !

Follow me for more video games ! 

Twitter - Twtich
